To be fair, the Democrats are just as bad. Where were those spineless whimps during the big anti-war demonstration in D.C.? They left town because AIPAC told them to.

I feel sorry for the American people, because each election they only get to choose between two evils and are being told that this is democracy.

 
 Yet many Americans firmly believe in what their representation, the two evils, tell them to believe as their civil liberties are striped away under the guise of 'protecting democracy' while those same representatives loot the national treasure and expand debt for special interests. Ignorance or just fools?

Well, it's all right about the guns and XXXXXX, the abortions and mercy killings, but what really gets my goat is Marshall Field's stores will now be called Macy's!
 
 
"It's so awful I can't even believe it," said Tracy Kepler, a 37-year-old Chicago attorney who remembers in vivid detail time spent at the store as a child, including the trip to downtown Chicago to see the windows every Christmas Eve day, followed by a meal in the Walnut Room.
 
 Kepler said she e-mailed the news to all sorts of people, including ex-Chicagoans who live all over the country.
 
 "Everybody is outraged," she said. "I e-mailed my girlfriend who lives in Colorado, and she had a conference call with her parents, who now live in Omaha, and her sister, who's in Shreveport (La.), and they're all commiserating about it."

 
 Just when I thought Americans were no longer concerned about anything. But they are. I, for one, AM MAD AS HELL AND I"M NOT GOING TO TAKE IT ANY LONGER!!

Ignorance or just fools?

 I think it's a bit of both. Some people just don't want to know the bad stuff because it scares them and forces them to think. Ignorance is bliss and even when presented with a chance not to be ignorant anymore, some people willfully don't take that chance.

I think it's a bit of both. Some people just don't want to know the bad stuff because it scares them and forces them to think. Ignorance is bliss and even when presented with a chance not to be ignorant anymore, some people willfully don't take that chance.

 
 And those with the most to lose, lower and middle classes, keep their blinders on as the lower tier of a sharply divided two-tiered society envelopes them.
